remarks: Multiplicativity of the permutation sign function.  (Contributed by SO, 9-Jul-2018.)
statement:
psgninv.s $e |- S = ( SymGrp ` D ) $.
psgninv.n $e |- N = ( pmSgn ` D ) $.
psgninv.p $e |- P = ( Base ` S ) $.
psgnco $p |- ( ( D e. Fin /\ F e. P /\ G e. P ) -> ( N ` ( F o. G ) ) = ( ( N ` F ) x. ( N ` G ) ) ) $.
